info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 12:05PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Scattered showers and thunderstorms this afternoon... Scattered showers and thunderstorms will affect Southwest MT this afternoon. The storms will generally move from south to north around 20 mph. Expect a brief period of rain and gusty winds as the storms move through. A few of the stronger storms could produce a short period of heavy rainfall, with around a half inch of rainfall possible. Anyone who has outdoor or travel plans through Southwest MT this afternoon should be alert for quickly changing weather conditions.
